about_the_game:
In "Shadow Strikers Arena of Rivals", the saga continues in Shadowhaven after the impact of the "Shadow Tournament". Now, with the "Arena of Rivals", new challenges emerge as champions from different factions battle for supremacy. Explore a world of intrigue where alliances are tested and secrets revealed. Prepare for intense battles where each victory redefines the balance of power in the city. Who will emerge as the next leader of Shadowhaven? Discover and leave your mark in this arena of glory and betrayal!

• Simple Controls, Deep Combat: The game offers simple controls for gameplay, with four buttons for main attacks (Light Punch, Light Kick, Heavy Punch, Heavy Kick). By combining these buttons with the arrows, players can perform a variety of special attacks. Despite simplified controls, the game provides a wide range of possibilities to create combos during fights. Additionally, it's possible to execute predefined combos by combining Punch and Kick buttons, combos taught step-by-step in the game's tutorial mode.

• Online and Local Multiplayer Mode: Challenge your friends online or play locally in multiplayer mode (a controller is required for local multiplayer). Engage in exciting battles and test your skills against players from around the world or challenge your friends in intense combat.

Get ready to enter an arena where deadly secrets blend with powerful strikes. Who will emerge as the champion of "Shadow Strikers Arena of Rivals" and shape the destiny of Shadowhaven? Join the fight and discover the answer!
